Translations.Text: elesaya ovunaṭa pera siṭiyavun veta yam daham dūtayaku pæmiṇi viṭa hūniyam karuveki nætahot ummattakayeki yæyi ovuhu pævasuvā misa novīya
ovun ekinekā mē gæna upades dennō da? esē nova ovun sīmāva ikmavā giya pirisaki
eheyin num̆ba ovungen hærī yanu. hētuva num̆ba dos naganu labanneku novanu æta
tavada num̆ba menehi karanu. hētuva niyata vaśayenma menehi kirīma dēva viśvāsavantayinṭa prayōjanavat vanu æta
tavada jin vargayā hā mānava vargayā vana ovun maṭa gætikam kirīmaṭa misa mama nomævvemi
ovungen mama kisidu pōṣaṇayak apēkṣā nokarami. emenma ovun maṭa āhāra sæpayiya yutu yæyi da mama apēkṣā nokarami
niyata vaśayenma allāh vana ohu sthāvara balaya æti mahā pōṣakayāya
eheyin niyata vaśayenma aparādha kaḷavun vanāhi ovungē sagayingē pāpayan men pāpayan ovunaṭa æta. eheyin ovuhu (dan̆ḍuvama) ikman karannæyi magen nopætiya yutuya
pratikṣēpa kaḷavunaṭa, ovunaṭa pratignā denu læbunu ovungē dinayē vināśaya æta
tūr kanda mata divuramin
liyana lada granthaya mata divuramin
digu harina lada lēkhaṇayehi
bayitul maḥmūr (hevat sat ahasaṭa ihaḷin æti maḷakvarungē næmædum paḷa) mata divuramin
ihaḷaṭa osavana lada viyana mata divuramin
gini moḷavanu labana (rælivalin yut) muhuda mata divuramin
niyata vaśayenma num̆bagē paramādhipatigē barapatala dan̆ḍuvama siduvannakmaya
eya vaḷakvana kisiveku næta
edina ahasa tadabala calanayakin calanaya vana dinayayi
tavada kan̆du bhayānaka salitayakin salita veyi
eheyin boru kaḷavunaṭa edina vināśayayi
ovuhu vanāhi (puhu kaṭayutu vala) nirata va keḷilol karamin siṭinnō veti
edina nirayē ginna veta dakkāgena yamin væren tallu karanu læbē
“meya num̆balā kavara ginnak boru karamin siṭiyehu da ema ginnayi.”
